name: Shadow Vault 29
description:
Game is still at very early stages of development.

As you were searching the harsh terrain of the hostile alien world Planet Magor in your personal space craft, you detected what looked like a hidden treasure cache known as a Shadow Vault.  If you successfully break into this vault, it will be your 29th one and since this one is on Magor, you know there's something really rare and valuable in there.
